Job functions and responsibilities  
 Communicate with the engineering and research team to understand technical specifications of 
the product  
 Design 2D and 3D illustrations and ensure that they are identical to sketches provided by the 
engineering team  
 Develop and implement design strategies  
 Review and oversee manufacturing of designs  
 Ensure that final designs are in compliance with design standards  
 Create detailed design documentation  
 Explaining scientific and engineering principles to the clients  
 Test sample products to ensure that designs are convenient and easy to use by the end user
